photoStudio.infoIconDescription: Info icon gives more information about a section.
photoStudio.liveImagesInfo: Please note that the images from Live Images will be directly published & visible to your customers on your live site.
photoStudio.draftImagesInfo: Draft Images are visible only to you. Feel free to experiment until you find the right fit and are ready to Publish it to the Live Images.
photoStudio.noLiveImagesMessage: You can publish draft images to make them live.
photoStudio.draftImagesEmptyMessage: You can select live images or upload new images to start editing.
photoStudio.draftImagesEmptyMessageNoLive: You can upload images to start editing.
photoStudio.copyEditHint: Select one or more images to apply Copy Edit, or click "Upload Image" to upload new ones.
photoStudio.imageCurrentlyPublishing: This image is currently being published.
photoStudio.maxReferenceImages: You can select or upload up to 6 images for copy edits.

editModes.label: Edit Modes
editModes.infoContent: Choose how you want to edit your image

photoStudio.productPageUnavailable: Your site is not published or the product page is unavailable.

upgrade.title: Upgrade Your AI Product Images Plan
upgrade.exhaustedCredits: You've exhausted your plan credits. Upgrade to a higher plan to generate new images.
upgrade.upgradeForMoreCredits: Upgrade your plan to get more credits.

unpublish.title: Live Image Unpublish
unpublish.content: At this moment you cannot delete/unpublish images directly from AI Product Images. Please visit the Edit Product Page and remove it from there.
unpublish.refreshNote: Refresh your page to see the changes.

imagesGenerated.label: Images Generated
imagesGenerated.infoContent: Select the number of images to generate

autoUpscaling.label: Auto Upscaling
autoUpscaling.infoContent: When enabled, images smaller than 1000px will be automatically upscaled to x2 for better quality.

setOutputDimensions.label: Set output dimensions
setOutputDimensions.infoContent: Select the aspect ratio for the generated images.

photoQuality.label: Photo quality
photoQuality.infoContent: Add quality tags to enhance your image

productPositioning.infoContent: Choose how the product is positioned in the image

backgroundType.infoContent: Select the background type for your image
